text: Honor Thy Father (originally titled as Con-Man) is a 2015 Filipino crime thriller movie directed by Erik Matti and starring John Lloyd Cruz, Meryll Soriano, Dan Fernandez, Yayo Aguila, Khalil Ramos. ==Other websites== * Category:2015 crime movies Category:2015 thriller movies Category:2010s crime thriller movies Category:Filipino movies Category:Movies about con artists Category:Movies directed by Erik Matti
title: Honor Thy Father (movie)
